Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Relates to the Syracuse regional airport authority
Summary: Relates to the powers of the Syracuse regional airport authority; provides certain positions that are necessary to ensure such airport's compliance with certain federal regulations are in the exempt class of the civil service law.
LawCode: Amd ยง2799-ggg, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to the powers of the Syracuse regional airport
